    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2197</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Resistor-Capacitator (RC) Circuits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Widerstand-Capacitator (RC) Stromkreise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Circuits de la Résistance-Capacitator (RC)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Circuitos Do Resistor-Capacitator (RC)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Circuiti Del Resistore-Capacitator (RC)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κυκλώματα αντιστάτης- Capacitator (RC)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Circuitos Del Resistor-Capacitator (RC)</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A simulation which demonstrates what occurs in when a resistor capacitator circuit is being charged and discharged</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circuits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Simulation, die zeigt, was innen auftritt, 
wenn ein Widerstand capacitator Stromkreis aufgeladen und entladen 
wird</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une simulation qui démontre ce qui se produit 
dedans quand un circuit de capacitator de résistance est chargé et 
déchargé</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma simulação que demonstre o que ocorre dentro
quando um circuito do capacitator do resistor for carregado e 
descarregado</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una simulazione che dimostra che cosa accade 
dentro quando un circuito di capacitator del resistore sta caricando e
scaricando</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια προσομοίωση που καταδεικνύει τι εμφανίζεται μέσα 
όταν χρεώνεται ένα κύκλωμα capacitator αντιστατών και 
εκφορτίζεται</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una simulación que demuestra qué ocurre adentro
cuando se está cargando y se está descargando un circuito del 
capacitator del resistor</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stromkreise</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
